tx.help: TX pin for serial connection. D1 assumed if Arduino Form Factor, needs to be set/overwritten otherwise

rx.help: RX pin for serial connection. D0 assumed if Arduino Form Factor, needs to be set/overwritten otherwise

rts.help: RTS pin for serial connection, defaults to Not Connected

cts.help: CTS pin for serial connection, defaults to Not Connected

rst.help: RESET pin for the modem, defaults to Not Connected

country-code.help: ISO 3166-1 coded, 2 character alphanumeric country code, 'CN' by default

channel-start.help: the channel number to start at, 1 by default
